text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
A few days have gone by since<n>Agnes Tachyon ditched the
tryouts.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I spot her in the hallway, and to avoid<n>being wrapped up in
another freak<n>experiment, I silently try to escape—

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
Then... you've made up your mind?<n>You're really going to
leave?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
By "leave"... Does she mean dropping<n>out? I suddenly stop,
absorbed in their<n>conversation.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Yes, I suppose. It appears that the<n>academy forcing me to
enter the last<n>tryouts was them giving me one last<n>chance.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
You could've just... entered the<n>tryouts. Or maybe...
attended a few<n>more classes...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
I'll always pass on wasting time that<n>could go into my
research. That said,<n>I've always attended the useful<n>
classes.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
But... if you drop out, you won't be<n>able to race in the
Twinkle Series.<n>What will happen... to your research?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
I'll continue it, of course. I still have<n>my brain and body here
with me, after<n>all.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
And it's not as if the Twinkle Series<n>is the only place to race
against the<n>best Umamusume.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Perhaps I should move my lab<n>overseas! The UK, France,
America,<n>Dubai—the possibilities are limitless!

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Overseas... That's... pretty bold of<n>you...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Ha-ha-ha! Anything for the sake of<n>my research!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
In any case, I plan to use this<n>Umamusume body of mine, of
Agnes<n>Tachyon, to discover what lies<n>beyond our top
speed. That hasn't<n>changed one bit.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: ...Is that so?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Hm? What's this? Might you be<n>worried about me?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Could it be that after being<n>experimented on so many times,<n>
you've come around?! Never<n>fear—I'm willing to send my
future<n>medicines to you!

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
No thanks... I'm just hoping... I won't<n>be wrapped up in
weird experiments...<n>ever again.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: What?!

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: But... I'm glad you're continuing your<n>research. Goodbye.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Ah! Cafe, wait! I have one final<n>experiment... But I guess
she's gone<n>already.
choice_data_list: Are you dropping out of Tracen Academy?
Are you dropping out of Tracen Academy?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Greetings, rookie trainer. We've been<n>seeing each other a
lot lately, haven't<n>we?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
You nailed it. I got in because of<n>everyone's hopes for me,
and they<n>even overlooked my<n>eccentricities—but it looks
like the<n>higher-ups finally had enough.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
This academy is renowned for<n>prioritizing its students'
freedom and<n>does so by providing them with<n>cutting-edge
training facilities.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
But it has no need for students who<n>neither get scouted nor
make their<n>official debut.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
It doesn't need someone who skips<n>class and refuses
scouting offers in<n>favor of research.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: In the end, the academy<n>recommended that I drop out.
choice_data_list: Do you plan to go along with it?
Do you plan to go along with it?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
It's a shame I won't be able to enter<n>the Twinkle Series.
And my research<n>will surely slow down as well.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
However... it's still better than letting<n>my research stagnate
in favor of<n>school.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
I knew this day would come. Perhaps<n>I was waiting for it.
Actually, this is—

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I won't have you saying something<n>as sad as "This is a
blessing."

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Oh? Now here's a surprise. If it isn't<n>one of the academy's
top brass.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Sorry to interrupt, but I have some<n>business with her. Agnes
Tachyon, do<n>you really intend to leave this<n>academy?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
My intentions are to continue my<n>research, President. Is that
all you<n>came here to ask?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Yes, that is all. As such, I have a<n>request for you.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: A request? Hmph, what could it be?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Agnes Tachyon—come for a run with<n>me.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Oh, and there you are in the stands.<n>Rookie trainer, you're
rather<n>persistent, now aren't you?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The rumored Agnes Tachyon running<n>with the Emperor,
Symboli Rudolf?<n>Nothing in the world could dissuade<n>me
from watching.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Hmph. I don't hate a person who's<n>starving for knowledge.
Watch to your<n>heart's content...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Because this is the last time I'll run<n>on this track.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Sorry for the wait, Agnes Tachyon.<n>It's just us two... and
this rookie<n>trainer. Looks like we can enjoy our<n>duel in
peace.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Isn't that precisely why you picked<n>this time slot? I don't
know what<n>you're planning, though.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Hm... Now then, does 2,000 meters on<n>turf sound good to
you?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Anything is fine with me. I'm sure<n>I'm greatly indebted to
you, so I'd be<n>happy to return the favor.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
There is no reason to thank me—in the<n>end, I failed to protect
you.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Ha-ha-ha! You're always way too<n>serious! Anyways, 2,000
meters on<n>turf, right? I'll go get ready.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
She enrolled at Tracen to enter the<n>Twinkle Series for her
research. But if<n>her duties as a student here hinder<n>her
research, then her leaving is<n>inevitable.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
There's no need for her to stick with<n>the Twinkle Series.
She can move her<n>base of operations anywhere else<n>and
enter other races with skilled<n>competitors.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Everything she does is so logical,<n>which makes it all the
more strange,<n>does it not?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Why has she chosen to stay at this<n>academy until breaking
point?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Why this academy, where she can't<n>avoid the trainers she
herself calls<n>nuisances?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: ...What do you think?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
And so, the race between Agnes<n>Tachyon and Symboli
Rudolf begins,<n>with me as its sole spectator!
